## EventFeature type

A special feature which adds an event handler property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EventFeature<O extends {}, S, P = {}> = S extends EventHandlerDefinition<infer Event, infer Payload> ? Feature<O, S, EventHandlerProps<Event, Payload> & P> : never;
```
